meanings.definition: Euplastics: the branch of medicine dealing with the correction of deformities or defects of the body by plastic surgery.
meanings.sent1: In euplastics, doctors help fix body problems through surgery.
meanings.sent2: She decided to specialize in euplastics to help people feel better about themselves.
meanings.sent3: The euplastics team worked together to give the patient a new smile.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in euplastics transformed lives like magic.
meanings.sent5: The advancements in euplastics have made surgeries safer and more effective.

meanings.definition: Euplastics: capable of being molded or shaped.
meanings.sent1: The euplastics material was easy to shape into different forms.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use euplastics to create unique sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The euplastics toy could transform into various animals with a twist.
meanings.sent4: Her flexible thinking was like euplastics, adapting to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The euplastics clay allowed for endless creativity in art class.
